duties_responsibilities.duty: Sales and Business Development: Visit and court potential clients, target convention and hotel conferences, capitalize on ways to attract and sell to each, and target companies that use DMCs and independent planners to find event venues.

Coordinate event details with clients once the contract is signed, work with event vendors and venue operations teams on event preparation, and provide on-site day of event coordinating to ensure execution is on schedule.
Coordinate production and distribution of event marketing materials, and assist in the development and implementation of marketing plans as needed.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent, plus 2-3 years of experience in sales management and/or marketing. College degree preferred.
